zh-CN: 我已知晓：本测评为心理特质评估与情绪初筛工具，不提供临床医疗诊断结论。
我已知晓：本测评结果仅基于自评数据生成，若出现明显痛苦或功能受损，我将优先寻求线下精神心理专科与专业人员帮助。
我已知晓：当系统检测到高危信号，将展示危机求助信息并暂停商业推荐。
我同意平台按隐私政策对数据进行匿名化与安全存储，用于生成报告与改进服务。
en: I understand this assessment is a screening and self-exploration tool, not a medical diagnosis.
I understand results are based on self-report data and I should seek professional support if distress or impairment is significant.
I understand crisis resources will be shown and promotional content will be paused when high-risk signals are detected.
I consent to de-identified and secure data processing for report generation and service quality improvement.

primary_button.zh-CN: 我已阅读并同意，开始测评
primary_button.en: I have read and agree, start assessment
